DOC.brief_summary: Background : Obesity treatment individualize since calorie restrict diet n't work individual . Objective : assess effect two different calorie restriction MediterrAsian diet weight loss FTO rs9939609 carrier overweight . Methods : recruit 80 healthy overweight participant age 20-45 year randomly allocate two interventional group [ group 1 : Mediterrasian diet accord adjust ideal body weight 500 calorie restriction ( RD ) group 2 : without 500 calorie restriction ( NRD ) + Moderate physical activity ] . Anthropometric indices assess participant weekly two month . The criterion weight loss 250-500 grams weekly . Metabolic index , physical activity psychologic aspects assess baseline end intervention . Dietary adherence check 24hr recall day 0 , 30 60 . At end study , compare carrier different allele ( AA+TA TT ) two intervention group find calorie restriction appropriate genotype . Significant p-value less 0.05 .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Calorie Restricted MediterrAsian Diet Weight Loss FTO rs9939609 Overweight Carriers
DOC.criteria: Minimum age : 20 year Maximum age : 45 year Gender : Both Accepts Healthy Volunteers ? : Yes Criteria : BMI range : 24.929.9 ( overweight ) Ethnicity : Persian History metabolic disease like Diabetes , CVD , Thyroid problem ... . History depression Pregnancy , try become pregnant breast feed Smoking Use alcohol Significant weight loos last two month ( > 5 kilogram ) diet last two month Use drug supplement
